name: AdCreate
desc: The request to create an ad, and assigning a creative to an ad group.

items.name: adGroupId
items.desc: The unique identifier for an adgroup.You can use the EQUALS and IN selector Condition operators with Find Ads.

items.name: campaignId
items.desc: The unique identifier for a campaign.

items.name: creationTime
items.desc: The date and time the object was created.You can use the EQUALS, LESS_THAN, and GREATER_THAN selector Condition operators with Find Ads.

items.name: creativeId
items.desc: The unique identifier for a creative.You can use the EQUALS and IN selector Condition operators with Find Ads.

items.name: creativeType
items.desc: The type of creative. See CreativeType for value descriptions.Verify only one custom product page is assigned to the ad group.You can use the EQUALS selector Condition operator with Find Ads.

items.name: deleted
items.desc: Indicates whether an ad has been deleted.You can use the EQUALS and IN selector Condition operators with Find Ads.

items.name: id
items.desc: An adId is a unique identifier representing the assignment relationship between an ad group and an ad.You can use the EQUALS and IN selector Condition operators with Find Ads.

items.name: modificationTime
items.desc: The date and time of the most recent modification of the ad.You can use the EQUALS, LESS_THAN, and GREATER_THAN selector Condition operators with Find Ads.

items.name: name
items.desc: The date and time of the most recent modification of the ad.This field is updatable.You can use the EQUALS, LESS_THAN, and GREATER_THAN selector Condition operators with Find Ads.

items.name: orgId
items.desc: The identifier of the organization that owns the campaign. Your orgId is the same as your account in the Apple Search Ads UI.

items.name: servingStateReasons
items.desc: Reasons provided when an ad isnâ€™t running. For example, if the DeviceClass changes, the servingStateReasons may change.See AdServingStateReasons for value descriptions.

items.name: servingStatus
items.desc: The indicator of the status of an ad assignment with an adgroup.See AdServingStatus for value descriptions.

items.name: status
items.desc: The status of the ad.  See AdStatus for value descriptions.This field is updatable.You can use the EQUALS and IN selector Condition operators with Find Ads.
